publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5794# Sandra White: Glasgow City of Science—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of Glasgow City of Science, a project bringing together Glasgow Science Centre, Glasgow City Council, the city’s four universities, Glasgow Art School and Glasgow Botanic Gardens alongside other colleges and organisations, which will celebrate Glasgow’s great heritage as a centre of science while encouraging interest, education and investment in the science, medicine, technology and engineering sectors; supports this initiative and its goals to enhance the city and create a hub of scientific excellence, and wishes the Glasgow City of Science project every success. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Patrick Harvie*, Rob Gibson*, Robert Brown*
S3M-5794# Glasgow City of Science (lodged on 22 February 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-5794# Glasgow City of Science (lodged on 22 February 2010) Alison McInnes*

S3M-5794# Sandra White: Glasgow City of Science—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of Glasgow City of Science, a project bringing together Glasgow Science Centre, Glasgow City Council, the city’s four universities, Glasgow Art School and Glasgow Botanic Gardens alongside other colleges and organisations, which will celebrate Glasgow’s great heritage as a centre of science while encouraging interest, education and investment in the science, medicine, technology and engineering sectors; supports this initiative and its goals to enhance the city and create a hub of scientific excellence, and wishes the Glasgow City of Science project every success. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Patrick Harvie, Rob Gibson, Robert Brown, Stuart McMillan, Joe FitzPatrick, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris, Jamie Hepburn, Stewart Maxwell, Bill Aitken, Alison McInnes, Jack McConnell*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-5794# Glasgow City of Science (lodged on 22 February 2010) Gil Paterson*
S3M-5794# Glasgow City of Science (lodged on 22 February 2010) Liam McArthur*
S3M-5794# Glasgow City of Science (lodged on 22 February 2010) Ken Macintosh*
